message: Any help please with the best ORM to use with MVC or the EF is enough and best for it? From maintability and performance point of view ?

data.message:
I'm guessing from your question that your requirement is only to have "maintainable" and "performant" code. No specifics.
EF will do just fine for that. Assuming you'll be using the latest 6.x.x release (Whatever comes by default anyway, don't be confused by the version mention).
